actions.text: The House Committee on Appropriations reported an original measure, H. Rept. 119-172, by Mr. Harris (MD).
Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 138.

official_title: Making appropriations for Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2026, and for other purposes.
short_title: Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2026
